definitions.definition: The tenth letter of many Semitic alphabets/abjads ( Phoenician , Aramaic , Hebrew , Syriac , Arabic and others).
A tool used to read a Torah .

main_definition: The tenth letter of many Semitic alphabets/abjads ( Phoenician , Aramaic , Hebrew , Syriac , Arabic and others).
secondary_definitions: A tool used to read a Torah .
